adjectives.description: sisterly (comparative more sisterly, superlative most sisterly)

examples: Burton designed both Middleton sisters' dresses in white, so that when Pippa picked up Kate's train in the abbey, the two of them were united, visually, in a display of sisterly togetherness.

adverbs.description: sisterly (comparative more sisterly, superlative most sisterly)

entries.meaning: In the manner of a sister, behaving as one would expect of a sister; as a sister, as sisters.
